entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning then becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 80 gusting to 110 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
